name: Deadly Shark Shooter
description:
Play it like you have no other purpose except hunting wild angry shark, you are in the massive wide deep sea your partner got killed by shark attacks and is dead now it’s your time to show your underwater hunting skills and hunt killer shark like a true shark sniper hunter in this addictive underwater shark simulator game.

Features:
• Easy and smooth controls to enhance your spear fishing.
• Attractive 3d graphics for underwater hunter.
• Real sound effects of shooting and hunting.
• Thrilling game-play of like never in this shark simulator game.
